verbose_text: Given that Noelin1 was found colocalized with the ECM, activity dependent remodeling of the ECM might lead to an increase or decrease in the presentation of Noelin1 to the AMPARs on extrasynaptic sites, affecting their mobility and regulating the availability of extrasynaptic AMPARs to be exchanged with synaptic AMPARs.
evidence: ECM               might lead to an increase or decrease in the presentation of Noelin1 to the AMPARs on extrasynaptic sites, affecting their mobility and regulating the availability of extrasynaptic AMPARs
